designPhilosophy.principle: Clean, minimal, content-first navigation. The navigation should feel unobtrusive, allowing content to take center stage while remaining easily accessible.
designPhilosophy.aesthetic: Modern iOS/Android native-style bottom navigation with minimalist approach - no shadows, no gradients, just clean surfaces and clear visual hierarchy.
